Analyze and model the distribution of colonial administrative spending across regions.

## Prompt: 
How did budget allocation reflect priorities like military control, education, or infrastructure? What patterns emerge across empires?

## ðŸ“¥ Data Load
```{r}
admin <- read_csv("assets/datasets/colonial_budgets.csv")

admin %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = region, y = budget, fill = expense_type)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "stack") +
  labs(title = "Colonial Budget Allocations by Region",
       y = "Budget (in millions)", x = "Region") +
  theme_minimal()
```
